description:
Bills Vs. Income is an easy to use personal financial management tool that aims for one thing: keeping it simple! This app is built around watching your income, bills, & budgets on a month to month basis. Bill Vs. Income is aimed for those that don't want to enter every little transaction down to the penny, but would still like to know how much money that can expect to have left over at the end of the month, or how much they'll have a few months from now.

Updates:
2.0.0: Data Processing completely redone.  App should be faster and more efficient.  Added calendar and numerous other features/fixes.
2.0.1: Fixed issue with updating a single bill

Free versions includes ads, has no webOS notifications, no dynamic icon, and will receive fewer updates and support requests.  Other than that it's still a fully functional personal financial management tool and will never expire.
